channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Grass verge overgrown at junction of Cleeve golf club, 27th May
item.description:
Cross roads on golf club and Bushcombe lane There is also a banner advertising coffee which obstructs view of cars coming up from Winchcombe near the golf club
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wickfield Lane, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: General poor condition of road surface following extensive roadworks, 27th May
item.description:
Green Street for most of the area from Ermine Street to the turning for Spinners Road is in generally very poor condition and has had multiple small repairs. It was subject to extensive road works in March and April this year. The road surface has been in poor condition for many years and needs a complete refurbish. We represent the residents of the Cotswold Chase development, and I was asked at our last meeting to contact you about this.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Green Street, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Post or sign leaning slightly (less than 20 degrees) problem, 27th May
item.description:

item.category: Post or sign leaning slightly (less than 20 degrees)

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 27th May
item.description:
Please pass to relevant ahr covering this area. Please send first vegetation letter to occupier of 3 Priory Street instructing them to cut back low hanging tree branches above footway back to their boundary.

item.description:

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 27th May
item.description:
This tree sadly had its stake removed a while back and has now been further damaged. A nearby resident has asked me to bring it to your attention. She thinks it can be saved and is willing to help but is requesting that it gets some TLC from the right people first. Could whoever deals with trees take a look please and let me know the outcome so I can pass this information back to the resident.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Steel drain cover in middle of London Road outside Wok Wagon has slippedWok, 27th May
item.description:
Outside Chinese Takeaway on London Road, up from Sandford Mill Road junction. A steel drain cover has slipped downward in its frame. Any further movement could expose a dangerous pot hole
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 163, London Road, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dog poo bags left beside road, 27th May
item.description:
Whittle Garden is New Estate and most property is occupied now. This area is becoming popular for Dog walker as itâ€™s near by is wide open fields and fishing pond. Unfortunately some Dog owners are not taking away their dog fouling with them. sometimes throwing the poo bag on the grass besides foot path/ bridle way making it real messy. I request to install few dog fouling bins all along the Centurion road and on the bridle way connecting Whittle Garden and Twigworth Green.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Centurion Road, Innsworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Assisted lift and lower broken, 27th May
item.description:
Bollard at the end of Church Street just in side The Minster Churchyard. It's stuck and won't operate properly, meaning the way is clear for vehicles to drive into churchyard. If this could be attended to as soon as possible that would be great. If the key needs changing, please do let St Matthew's Church Office know. Thanks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Church Street, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Complete bollard is damaged (Non illuminating bollard or post)

item.title: Blocking visibility on road/junction (Grass/verge) problem, 27th May
item.description:
Branch has fallen off a tree and it has covered the verge and when they had come and cut the verge but was unable to, are we able to have a look into this, the branch is still on the verge.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: New trees have blown over, 27th May
item.description:
Two trees, newly planted last year have blown over and are now subject to wind rock. Both need re staking. The trees are on the verge on Ashley Close, near the junction with Greenway Lane, Charlton Kings, Cheltenham.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ashley Close, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Poor workmanship in this T junction., 27th May
item.description:
Dear team, this Junction need to be resurfaced, there was a car burn down here also, people are using this road to access the lovely pittville park, but the road surface is eye souring.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 43, Hanover Street, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
